title: Anabasis: My Glory is Upon the Seas, My Strength is Amongst You
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; Charles Sessler, Inc., Philadelphia, PA, until November 1957; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1957 until February 8, 1960 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1960 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Charles Sessler, Inc. invoiced Mrs. Beal $300 for "Special set Anabasis" on October 28, 1957. Payment was sent on November 7, 1957 and acknowledged on November 12, 1957 (see curatorial file.) 
[2]. The set of lithographs was accessioned on February 8, 1960.
